data.name: Business One - Plus
data.description: Everyday Business Account for online and in-branch banking

features.additionalInfo: Pocket $100 on us! Open a new Business transaction account, deposit $100 within the first 10 days using the description WELCOME100 and pocket a $100 gift card on us. New business customers only. Accounts opened between 1st February and 30th June 2024. T&Cs apply.
25 free staff-assisted and cheque transactions per month
View up to 7 years of eStatements history

features.additionalValue: Link your account to a Business Debit Mastercard

features.additionalInfo: With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.
Link your account balances and transactions to your accounting software, such as MYOB, XERO or Quickbooks.
Link your account to Biz Invoice and easily create, send and manage your invoices that your customers will receive by email.
Subject to terms and conditions relationship management is available for eligible customers.

Westpac Protect Security Guarantee If your Westpac account is compromised as a result of Internet fraud, we guarantee to repay any missing funds, providing you comply with our Online Banking Terms and Conditions.
No interest is paid on this account.
You will get regular statement for this product
You can make Periodical Payments from this account
Cheque access available for customers above 18 years of age
Your company / business can pay bills using BPAY
Make and receive secure payments via PayID

features.additionalValue: Westpac Business Debit MasterCard/Handycard access is available on the account

features.additionalInfo: Account enquiries are always free when you use Online Banking.
An overdraft / loan facility is available (subject to approval). Customers must be over 18 years of age.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must not be an individual using the account for predominantly personal purposes
Eligible entities include sole traders, partnerships, companies, associations, self-managed super funds, trusts and not-for-profit organisations

fees.name: Monthly Plan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exceeded.

fees.name: Overseas Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Overseas Withdrawal fee from ATMs belonging to institutions in the Global ATM Alliance (An overseas bank surcharge may also apply). Nil for cash withdrawals from Global ATM Alliance and Westpac Group partner ATMs. To find an overseas ATM visit  westpac.com.au and search 'Global ATM Alliance'

fees.name: Account Enquiries: Business Telephone Banking Self-Service
fees.additionalInfo: 20 free per month, 25c for subsequent enquiries

discounts.additionalInfo: Telephone banking fees are waived when minimum monthly balance is greater than $5,000

fees.name: Account Enquiries: Business Telephone Banking Staff-Assisted
fees.additionalInfo: 20 free per month, 65c for subsequent enquiries

discounts.additionalInfo: Telephone banking fees are waived when minimum monthly balance is greater than $5,000

fees.name: Narrated Credits
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exhausted.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee - non-AU merchant
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located outside Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 1% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee)

fees.name: Cheques Collected / Deposited
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exceeded.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee - AU merchant
fees.additionalInfo: 2.2% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located in Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 0.2% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee).

fees.name: Account Enquiries: ATM
fees.additionalInfo: Non-Westpac/St. George/Bank of Melbourne/BankSA branded ATMs within Australia (cash withdrawals or balance enquiries). An ATM operator fee (disclosed at the time of the transaction) may be applied by the ATM owner

fees.name: Staff-Assisted Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exceeded.

fees.name: Cheques Written
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exceeded.

fees.name: Staff-Assisted Deposit
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable after free monthly transactions are exceeded.

fees.name: Periodical Payments
fees.additionalInfo: separate fees apply for Periodical Payments made by Bank Cheque and International Periodical Payments

fees.name: Pay Anyone
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for transfers to  another Westpac branded account or to any other account.

lendingRates.additionalValue: The Unarranged Lending Rate (ULR) is a debit interest rate charged to a transaction account if it becomes overdrawn without arrangement. It will be calculated daily on the debit balance (and deducted on the last business day of each month) using the then current ULR until the account balance is positive again.
